Submodules¶

modulesApplication.tests.utils module¶

modulesApplication.tests.utils.all_optional_modules()¶

take the dictionary created in from reading optional_modules_by_programmes.csv creates a new dictionary, key = prog_code and value = all optional mod_codes in prog_code

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_optional_modules()¶

Reads the list of optional modules exported from the sqlite3 database view optional_models_by_programme into OptionalModule objects.

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_optional_modules_dict()¶

Reads in the list of optional modules exported from the sqlite3 database view optional_modules_by_programme.

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_test_modules()¶

Insert modules from the sqlite3 csv into your local database.

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_test_optionrules()¶

Reads in the test option rules and saves them to the test database.

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_test_programmes()¶

Reads in the test programmes and saves them to the test database.

modulesApplication.tests.utils.read_test_strands()¶
